properties.name: workspaceId
properties.description: Create resources under the given workspace

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: The ID of the account to whom this task will be assigned

options.name: ownerid
options.description: The ID of the account to whom this task will be assigned

options.name: listID
options.description: Put the new task in a list ("project"). Omit this param to have the task be private.

options.name: startsOn
options.description: The date on which the task should start

options.name: dueOn
options.description: The date on which the task should be due

options.name: mirrorParentSubscribers
options.description: Whether this task will be a subtask, and this is true, the parent tasks's subscribers will be mirrored to this one

options.name: mirrorParentTags
options.description: Whether this task will be a subtask, and this is true, the parent tasks's tags will be mirrored to this one

options.name: noteContent
options.description: Provide the content for the task's note

options.name: name
options.description: The title of the task

options.name: completed
options.description: Whether to complete the task

options.name: ownerid
options.description: The ID of the account to whom this task will be assigned

options.name: listID
options.description: Put the new task in a list ("project"). Omit this param to have the task be private.

options.name: startsOn
options.description: The date on which the task should start

options.name: dueOn
options.description: The date on which the task should be due

options.name: mirrorParentSubscribers
options.description: Whether this task will be a subtask, and this is true, the parent tasks's subscribers will be mirrored to this one

options.name: mirrorParentTags
options.description: Whether this task will be a subtask, and this is true, the parent tasks's tags will be mirrored to this one

options.name: noteContent
options.description: Provide the content for the task's note

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a new task

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a task

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a task

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many tasks

properties.name: resource
properties.description: Tasks are units of work that can be private or assigned to a list. Through this endpoint, you can manipulate your tasks in Flow, including creating new ones.

options.name: Task
options.description: Tasks are units of work that can be private or assigned to a list. Through this endpoint, you can manipulate your tasks in Flow, including creating new ones.
